contextId.information: The garden of Eden was a beautiful place. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: land is like the garden of Eden

contextId.information: The head of a locust looks like a small horse head and the army is strong and fast like a horse. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: The army's appearance is like horses

contextId.information: These are compared to the noise of the locust army. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: a noise like that of chariots ... like the noise of fiery flames ... like a mighty army ready for battle
